author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
The final phase of 10th Edition Warhammer 40k has begun with 500 WORLDS - TITUS. This compilation of books includes new six new Detachments for mainstream 40k or the included missions, a complete Boarding Actions Campaign with new detachments for Astartes and Necrons and a standalone Map Campaign with the accessories to play it. Let's check it out!

Big thanks to GW for a complimentary copy of the books and boxes to review.

title: GMG Reviews - 500 WORLDS: TITUS - War on the Vespator Front  by Games Workshop

author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
The final phase of 10th Edition Warhammer 40k has begun with 500 WORLDS - TITUS. This compilation of books includes new six new Detachments for mainstream 40k or the included missions, a complete Boarding Actions Campaign with new detachments for Astartes and Necrons and a standalone Map Campaign with the accessories to play it. 

The re-taking of the Vespator front allows 3-12 players, led by a Warmaster to compete to clear planets in the sector to take control of this portion of the 500 worlds. Let's check it out!

Big thanks to GW for a complimentary copy of the books and boxes to review. 

#AdWIP

#New40k

title: GMG Reviews - 500 WORLDS: TITUS - War on the Vespator Front  by Games Workshop

author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
The final phase of 10th Edition Warhammer 40k has begun with 500 WORLDS - TITUS. This compilation of books includes new six new Detachments for mainstream 40k or the included missions, a complete Boarding Actions Campaign with new detachments for Astartes and Necrons and a standalone Map Campaign with the accessories to play it. 

Dread Incursions is a standalone Boarding Actions expansion for Warhammer 40,000 that includes both the conversion rules for the core system of 40k and three ways to play linked skirmish missions of 40k. Let's check it out!

Big thanks to GW for a complimentary copy of the books and boxes to review.
